app.title: FrameSpeak - Video Frame Analysis Tool
app.uploadVideoDesc: Upload a video file to start extracting frames and analyzing with AI
app.configWarningDesc: Please configure your LLM service by clicking the "LLM Config" button in the top right corner before analyzing images.
app.welcomeDesc: Before you begin, please configure your LLM service (such as Ollama, OpenAI, LM Studio, or other compatible services). Once configured, you can upload videos and use AI to analyze video frames.
app.setupReminder: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please configure LLM service first to use AI analysis features

uploader.dragTip: Click or drag video file to this area to upload
uploader.supportTip: Supports MP4, WebM, AVI, and other formats

gallery.title: Extracted Frames
gallery.noConfigDesc: Please configure LLM service before analyzing frames

frameCard.noConfigDesc: Please configure LLM service before analyzing frames

tooltips.llmConfig: Configure LLM service (Ollama, OpenAI, LM Studio)
tooltips.clearVideo: Clear current video and all extracted frames
tooltips.uploadVideo: Drag & drop or click to select a video file
tooltips.extractInterval: Set the interval between extracted frames in seconds
tooltips.startExtraction: Start extracting frames from the video
tooltips.batchAnalyze: Batch analyze all unanalyzed frames with AI
tooltips.exportAll: Export all analyzed frame descriptions to a Markdown file
tooltips.analyzeFrame: Analyze this frame with AI and generate bilingual descriptions
tooltips.regenerateFrame: Regenerate description for this frame (will overwrite existing)
tooltips.copyAllDescriptions: Copy both English and Chinese descriptions to clipboard

seo.title: FrameSpeak - AI Video Frame Analysis Tool | Smart Image Description Generator
seo.description: FrameSpeak is a powerful AI-driven video frame analysis tool that supports local LLMs (Ollama, OpenAI, LM Studio). Automatically extract video frames and generate bilingual image descriptions, optimized for AI image generation models like Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, and DALL-E.
seo.keywords: video frame analysis,AI image description,video frame extraction,LLM,Ollama,image generation prompts,Stable Diffusion,Midjourney,DALL-E,local AI,video analysis tool

llmConfig.title: LLM Configuration
llmConfig.customPromptTooltip: Leave blank to use default prompt. If customizing, ensure it includes EN: and ZH: format requirements
llmConfig.customPromptPlaceholder: Leave blank to use default prompt. If customizing, ensure LLM outputs in EN: and ZH: format...
llmConfig.maxTokensTooltip: Default 4096. Recommended 2000-4096 for image generation to get complete detailed prompts

tips.title: Tips:
tips.ollama: Ollama: Ensure Ollama is running locally with vision models installed (llava, bakllava)
tips.openai: OpenAI: Requires API key and GPT-4 Vision access
tips.lmstudio: LM Studio: Ensure LM Studio server is running with a vision-capable model loaded
tips.imageGen1: Default prompt is optimized for AI image generation (Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.)
tips.imageGen2: Generated descriptions include 9 dimensions: precise subjects, composition, lighting, colors, atmosphere, technical details, etc.
tips.imageGen3: Automatically ignores watermarks, subtitles, UI elements, focusing only on reproducible visual content
tips.imageGen4: Recommended Max Tokens: 2000-4096 for complete image generation prompts
